title: UK races to test, vaccinate as virus variant threatens plans
content:
1. UK races to test, vaccinate as virus variant threatens plans  The Associated Press
  2. Covid variant from India more transmissible and threatens England lockdown easing, Boris Johnson says  CNBC
  3. Boris Johnson Says The U.K. Will Speed Up Its Vaccination Program to Combat India's Variant  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  4. The India Variant Won't Halt England's Reopening — Yet  Bloomberg
  5. Indian variant: How ‘surge vaccination’ could help in the UK’s fight against the Covid strain  iNews
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 英国では、ウイルスの変異により計画が脅かされているため、検査やワクチン接種を急いでいる
由于病毒变种威胁到计划，英国竞相进行测试和疫苗接种
由於病毒變種威脅到計劃，英國競相進行測試和疫苗接種
